synopsis.text: When a rogue scientist in San Francisco unleashes a new breed of monstrous creatures, the Neo-Aragami, chaos engulfs California. With the Susanoo power absent, the US government calls upon the former members of the Terrestrial Administration Center (TAC) to quell the menace. Meanwhile, tensions within TAC rise as Fujimiya Momiji and Kusanagi Mamoru grapple with their strained relationship. To complicate matters, a mysterious half-Aragami girl stirs up trouble for both TAC and Momiji. As jealousy flares and monsters wreak havoc, can Momiji and the team overcome their personal struggles to vanquish the Neo-Aragami and restore peace?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
